channel.title: Half Life: Source - Demo Playback Issues
channel.description:
I'm working on a fan video and I wanted a few scenes from Half-Life: Source. I record the demo, stop the demo, and when I attempt to play it back to render it out. I get the following error message.
![](upload://yOOxZSdPo31FQoMZGuQTxD3Wtva.png)
Google has been less then helpful, hoping I can find a solution here.

item.title: Half Life: Source - Demo Playback Issues
item.dc:creator: Guf
item.description:
The fact that the instruction is trying to access its own address is a bit odd… Best bet is to submit a Source bugreport (type bug at the console I think).

Read full topic
item.source: Half Life: Source - Demo Playback Issues
